jobDescription: 6/25/18 NEED CANDIDATES Title: Data Analyst  Location: Plano, TX  Project Duration: 6 Months Plus  Level: Master / DSM Job Description Skills Required: Information Analyzer and IGC, understand data quality dimensions and build frameworks, Experience in the FSS Industry. Familiar with other data quality tools available in the industry. Good Communication Skills. Leverage data management knowledge to maintain and define data quality and metadata processes.Participate in development of data quality rules, thresholds, and standard metrics/quality-expectations for data elements that support critical business processes.Participate in and may lead discussions with cross-functional teams.Profile data Documents effectiveness of data quality controls and metadata capture, and identifies improvement opportunities.Participate in development of best practices and tools based on business needs.Leverage knowledge to implement controls to mitigate data quality risks including monitoring data quality results, reports and dashboards.
